name: GenerateRecordingPassword
description:
Create a password for session recording sharing.

This tool creates a new password for the sharing configuration of a session recording, identified by project and recording IDs. Use it when you need to secure sharing of session recordings with a password.

parameters.name: project_identifier
parameters.description: Project ID for accessing a specific project. Retrieve via /api/projects/ to find the correct ID.

value_schema.description: Project ID of the project you're trying to access. To find the ID of the project, make a call to /api/projects/.

parameters.name: recording_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the session recording for which you want to create a sharing password. This ID is necessary to specify the exact recording within the project.

parameters.name: sharing_password_creation_details
parameters.description: JSON object containing information like password, settings, and access control for sharing configuration.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the PostHog API.

parameters.name: project_id
parameters.description: Project ID of the project you're trying to access. To find the ID of the project, make a call to /api/projects/.

value_schema.description: Project ID of the project you're trying to access. To find the ID of the project, make a call to /api/projects/.
